meanings.definition: A person who owns or operates a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The local restauranteur greeted every customer with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The successful restauranteur expanded their business to a new location.
meanings.sent3: The young restauranteur accidentally spilled soup on a customer, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The experienced restauranteur navigated the challenges of the industry with finesse.
meanings.sent5: The passionate restauranteur poured their heart into every dish they served.

meanings.definition: A business owner in the food service industry.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated restauranteur worked long hours to ensure the success of their business.
meanings.sent2: The local restauranteur was known for their delicious menu offerings.
meanings.sent3: The ambitious restauranteur dreamed of opening multiple restaurants across the city.
meanings.sent4: The visionary restauranteur saw opportunities where others saw challenges.
meanings.sent5: The hardworking restauranteur was always seeking ways to improve their establishment.
